# init(value:kind:)

**Initializer**

Creates a communication handle.

## Declaration

```swift
init(value: String, kind: CommunicationHandle.Kind)
```

## Parameters

- **value**: The value of the communication handle.
- **kind**: The type of communication handle.
title: init(value:kind:)
